attributes.action: Protect our Youth"s from sexual predators whom wait around public areas and toilets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All public areas that youth"s gather should be in a cemera zone to protect them.
It is known that men wait in public toilets, cinemas and parks, looking for innocent young men to abuse.
If cameras are located in these areas, at least these perverts can be traced and face the full weight of the law.
Some of these youth"s & young men dont realise the danger these predators cause until the damaged minds and bodies give up.
